title: The Inaugural Procession at Washington Passing the Gate of the Capitol Grounds, from Harper's Weekly, March 16, 1861, p. 161.
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
description: Vertical view showing an open carriage moving toward the left with Lincoln and Buchanan seated in it.  Crowds are visible in the foreground as well as mounted soldiers, and men are seated on the gateposts in the background, with a portion of the Capitol building visible in the extreme background.
name: Print
